Managing objects
Managing system objects / Orders
Orders
Orders allow you to efficiently group multiple jobs together to be processed as a single order. This feature simplifies the handling of multiple jobs,
making sure that all jobs within an order are managed together and completed in a coordinated manner.
In this section:
Adding and deleting jobs in an order
RICOH ProcessDirector lets you add multiple jobs to a new order or to an existing order. You can also delete jobs from an order.
Setting the due date for an order
Setting a due date for an order is an important step in making sure that your order is delivered on time and that you efficiently manage the
orders.
Setting the priority for an order
Assigning a priority to an order updates the jobs contained in the order to have a certain level of urgency. You can use the Set Priority action to
control how quickly the jobs move through their workflows.
Stopping, continuing, and deleting orders
RICOH ProcessDirector lets you stop or continue processing all the jobs in an order after they stopped.
